attributes.action: Petition for future Government not to honour Government Bonds issued by Gordon Brown to raise money to bail out the Banks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Government is getting the population into enormous debt to sure up a failing banking system. Gordon Brown is an unelected Prime Minister who has appointed Ministers,the democratic credibility of the Government is in doubt. The debt for the average family of 4 is £ 132000.00
at with normal base rates being around 5% and borrowing being around 2% over .
It represents about an extra £ 9,240.00 per family per year to meet this debt.
It is unrealistic to expect this country to recover with such overwhelming financial commitment. 
Please sign up to stop this ever more desperate government from ruining our country. They know the mess they are creating will not have to be dealt with for long by them.

rejection.details: Please resubmit including a point of action applicable to the current Government.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
